column5: How is it that the Root Administrator for Ontario Fishing Community is from the States. Isn't there anyone from Ontario that can do that job? Just askin'?

The root Admin  was the 77th member of this Board 14 years ago if you have an issue with Americans being part of this board you will not have a long and happy life here. Feel free to discuss this in a P.M.   Aplumma  Art Melancon  US citizen
why are our fishing licenses done in the states?  lol  dang they get all the good jobs
This root admin is from Quebec. Did I win?
Does it really matter where anyone is from? I don't understand the question?  S.
My   Skeeter was made in Texas so I spose that makes it American too, but that's OK cause it's a nice boat.

He is irritated at me because I  informed him his ad for the 2006 smoker craft was not following the rules and broke the link. I then got a p.m. from him asking why and I sent him a copy of the rules with the rule part bolded. He has since corrected it and I am sure in a little while he will wish that he had not started this thread.   The Admin American  or as some know me as The American that vacations/ fishes in Canada with a whole bunch of Canadian Friends   Art
O and my Ford has tires made in Canada.     Art
if the location wasn't there, would you have noticed?

It has nothing to do with that, I was just curious. Besides, anyone with any administrative prowess would not have said that over an open forum after he clearly stated any further discussion should be done in a PM, in his last post. Nice move, RA.
Yup, you got that right Art
I believe Mr. Bigworm has understood the message. Thanks.
